Technologies.title: SPECT/CT
Technologies.discription: SPECT/CT is an advanced and highly integrated diagnostic solution. It expands the role of nuclear medicine into routine surgical planning, orthopedics, advanced cardiology, and much more.

Technologies.title: EEG (Electroencephalography)
Technologies.discription: The electroencephalogram (EEG) is a measure of brain waves. It is a readily available test that provides evidence of how the brain functions over time.

Technologies.title: LINAC Accelerator (Novalis Tx)
Technologies.discription: Novalis Tx is a radiosurgery system that is one of the most advanced cancer treatments available. Radiosurgery is a highly precise form of radiation therapy that uses a beam of energy that is shaped to match the outline of the tumor.

Technologies.title: 3 Tesla MRI
Technologies.discription: The 3T Magnetom Trio is extremely efficient. Utilizing shorter scan times, and must we mantain quality best and provide world fast class services the 3T machine maximizes patient comfort without compromising quality.

Technologies.title: C-Arm Scan
Technologies.discription: C-Arms are one of the driving technological forces behind the advancement of minimally invasive surgeries.for in a variety of surgical and nonsurgical procedures.

Technologies.title: Digitalized X-Ray, USG, CT-Scan, MRI
Technologies.discription: SevenHills Hospital provides state-in-art facilities and has the best machines available. and more then effective services It includes Digitalized X-Ray, USG, CT-Scan & MRI.
